Welcome

Welcome to eltech global

From an initial core business of electrical engineering in the 1980â€™s, predominately building switchboards and control panels, Eltech was established in 1995 and soon evolved into a leading, standalone importer and wholesale distributor of electrical accessories to Australiaâ€™s electrical industry.

We specialise in complete and integrated project solutions for Australiaâ€™s electrical industry.

Our difference is in our knowledge and experience â€“ our team of highly reputable engineers and customer support managers will work with you to find solutions and achieve best practice outcomes. Strong and lasting relationships with our suppliers allow us to provide rapid turnaround times, and flexibility on any project.

More Info

Industries we serve

  • Construction
  • Automation
  • Military
  • Power Control
  • Fluid Management
  • Agriculture
Construction

We specialise in the supply of electrical hardware and industrial cabling to electrical contracting companies across Australia. Our team of project managers and engineers work in partnership with you to find the best project outcomes specific to your requirements.

Automation

Eltech Global is a highly respected supplier to the automation & robotics industries. Our extensive range is constantly evolving to serve this rapidly changing industry, and our enthusiastic team enjoys the challenge of presenting solutions to solve the many interesting & diverse scenarios and requirements of this industry.

Military

We are specialised suppliers, to the Australian Defence Force, providing full service solutions with heavily specified, custom designed, electrical hardware. Supplying the ADFâ€™s primary suppliers of Naval vessels, weaponry, training & other specialist equipment has been an exciting challenge for us, and led to a strong and lasting relationship with these suppliers.

Power Control

Supplying the switchboard & control panel manufacturing industry, has been the backbone of our business with over 15 years working in partnership with energy control businesses. We remain strongly committed to providing top quality products and services to this industry.

Fluid Management

We supply and extensive product range for all areas of fluid management! This includes custom designed & manufactured electrical enclosures, submersible cables, cable management & termination products, all manufactured to the highest standards to withstand the harshest environments.

Agriculture

We supply specialised electrical hardware used in the design and construction of automated dairy systems, crop irrigation systems and many other agricultural turn-key systems. We have the products & solutions to help Australian farmers make their operations more efficient and provide the latest technologies to automate farming processes and maximise yield.
